name: api_physics2d_Collider2D
description: The parent class for collider types used with 2D gameplay. Provides methods to defines the shape and physical behavior for 2D object interactions, used to detect collisions, and trigger events in 2D game environments.

properties.name: attachedRigidbody
properties.description: The Rigidbody2D attached to the Collider2D.

properties.name: bounceCombine
properties.description: The bounciness combine mode used by the Collider2D.

properties.name: bounciness
properties.description: The bounciness used by the Collider2D.

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: The world space bounding area of the collider.

properties.name: callbackLayers
properties.description: The Layers that this Collider2D will report collision or trigger callbacks for during a contact with another Collider2D.

properties.name: composite
properties.description: Get the CompositeCollider2D that is available to be attached to the collider.

properties.name: compositeCapable
properties.description: Indicates if this Collider2D is capable of being composited by the CompositeCollider2D.

properties.name: compositeOperation
properties.description: The composite operation to be used by a CompositeCollider2D.

properties.name: compositeOrder
properties.description: The composite operation order to be used when a CompositeCollider2D is used.

properties.name: contactCaptureLayers
properties.description: The layers of other Collider2D involved in contacts with this Collider2D that will be captured.

properties.name: contactMask
properties.description: Calculates the effective LayerMask that the Collider2D will use when determining if it can contact another Collider2D.

properties.name: density
properties.description: The density of the collider used to calculate its mass (when auto mass is enabled).

properties.name: errorState
properties.description: The error state that indicates the state of the physics shapes the 2D Collider tried to create. (Read Only)

properties.name: excludeLayers
properties.description: The additional Layers that this Collider2D should exclude when deciding if a contact with another Collider2D should happen or not.

properties.name: forceReceiveLayers
properties.description: The Layers that this Collider2D can receive forces from during a Collision contact with another Collider2D.

properties.name: forceSendLayers
properties.description: The Layers that this Collider2D is allowed to send forces to during a Collision contact with another Collider2D.

properties.name: friction
properties.description: The friction used by the Collider2D.

properties.name: frictionCombine
properties.description: The friction combine mode used by the Collider2D.

properties.name: includeLayers
properties.description: The additional Layers that this Collider2D should include when deciding if a contact with another Collider2D should happen or not.

properties.name: isTrigger
properties.description: Is this collider configured as a trigger?
